k-array-gdm.title: K-array GDM 2024
k-array-gdm.location: Scarperia e San Piero, Tuscany | Italy
profile: K-ARRAY Audio Solutions is globally renowned as one of the most innovative high-technology professional speaker manufacturers in the world founded in Italy. Since the formation of HP Sound Equipment in 1990 and K-ARRAY in 2005,the brand has been pioneering and innovating new audio solutions for live entertainment and the most demanding architectural designs.
additionalNotes: K‑array’s GDM (General Distributor Meeting) is an exclusive annual event held at the K-array’s headquarters in the scenic Tuscan village of Scarperia e San Piero, Italy. Distributors and partners from around the world come together to discover the latest innovations, experience new products, and learn about K‑array’s advanced audio solutions.
eventNarrative: The event features interactive product demonstrations and networking opportunities, giving distributors the chance to connect, learn, and share insights with industry peers. We had the opportunity to explore the latest and upcoming K‑array products and bring these innovations directly to our partners in Malaysia, ensuring they can offer cutting-edge audio solutions and an enhanced experience to their clients.
More than a meeting, K‑array GDM is a celebration of innovation, collaboration, and the shared passion for delivering exceptional audio experiences worldwide.

heroMedia.alt: Delegates overlooking the Tuscan hills during the K-array summit

suara-festival.title: K‑array Training & Suara Festival Bali 2024
suara-festival.overview: During our K‑array training in Bali, we gained in-depth product and software knowledge, learning how to maximize the performance of K‑array systems. We also visited a live installation at the Suara Festival, where K‑array speakers were used throughout the event. Seeing the system in action, we learned how and why the speakers were strategically placed, gaining practical insights into real-world applications and optimal sound delivery in diverse environments.
profile: The Suara Music and Arts Festival returns from July 26–28, 2024 at Nuanu, marking the official opening of the Creative City. Celebrated for its innovative programming and vibrant cultural experience, the festival brings together music, art, and community, offering a platform for both international and regional talent.

K-ARRAY Audio Solutions is globally renowned as one of the most innovative high-technology professional speaker manufacturers in the world founded in Italy. Since the formation of HP Sound Equipment in 1990 and K-ARRAY in 2005, the brand has been pioneering and innovating new audio solutions for live entertainment and the most demanding architectural designs.
additionalNotes: We are proud to have been invited to the Suara Festival 2024 in Bali, Indonesia—an international celebration of music, arts, and culture. Set against the stunning seaside cliffs of Nyanyi Beach, the festival featured 7 stages showcasing the best of international, regional, and local music talent, thought-provoking talks, immersive art installations, culinary experiences, wellness activities, and traditional Balinese performances.
eventNarrative: This year marked the third edition of Suara Festival, welcoming over 9,000 fans from more than 60 countries over three days. The festival attracted a vibrant mix of Bali locals and visitors, creating a truly global cultural experience. As Suara Co-Founder, CEO, Jason Swamy said, “Partnering with Sergey Solonin to bring Suara to Nuanu is a dream come true. Nuanu’s visionary approach and stunning venues provide the perfect setting for an inclusive, cross-cultural festival experience that Bali has never seen before.”

K-array loudspeakers played a vital role in delivering exceptional sound throughout the festival. Their high-performance, flexible, and discreet design ensured consistent audio quality across all stages and event areas. Suara Producer Alexander Solonin and Sound Engineer Semen Chumanikhin shared, “We had heard the power of K-array’s flexible Anakonda line array system and Thunder-KS2 subwoofer at Nuanu recording studio, which sounded truly amazing.” This instilled strong confidence in the K-array loudspeakers used throughout the event.

reka-rix.title: REKA Interiors Exhibition (RiX)
reka-rix.location: KL Convention Centre, Kuala Lumpur | Malaysia
reka-rix.overview: RiX is presented by C.I.S under REKA Design Week as the annual gathering for Malaysia's interior design community, curated by the Malaysian Institute of Interior Designers.
profile: RiX is a platform presented by C.I.S as an official event held under the REKA Design Week, which is the annual event for the interior designers’ community by the Malaysian Institute of Interior Designers (MIID).

Committed to showcasing only the very best of each exhibitor’s collections and products, RiX taps into Malaysia’s interior design industry – Offering a truly outstanding experience in a typically crowded marketplace with power-packed programmes and activities such as conference and forums, industry talks and updates, discussions, networking and workshops for the design fraternity.
additionalNotes: Nextrend Systems was honored to design the Total Sound Solution for the CURIOS Pavilion and to present a talk at RiX on “Design Senses – Sound”. For this event, K-array speakers were selected as the premier audio solution, chosen specifically to complement the pavilion’s refined design. The Anakonda flexible line array was installed along the walkway, delivering a seamless and immersive auditory experience that harmonized perfectly with the elegant architecture.
eventNarrative: To enhance the visual and experiential impact, we presented the iconic Brionvega Radiofonografo RR226 and Totem RR231, both celebrated pieces in the MoMA collection. These legendary designs, with over 50 years of history, blend visionary aesthetics with exceptional sound quality, elevating the pavilion experience for all visitors.

Inside the SoundPod Room, we curated a fully immersive audio environment. Compact yet powerful K-array Lyzard KZ14 speakers were placed strategically in each of the four corners, creating a dynamic and enveloping soundscape that captivates visitors and draws them into the pure elegance of sound.

For more subtle areas, K-array Vyper KV102 speakers were installed in two corners, offering discreet yet powerful audio without impacting the aesthetic. The understated design ensures the auditory experience complements the pavilion’s ambiance, allowing guests to enjoy sound and space in perfect harmony.

For talks and stage performances, the K-array Pinnacle KR402 was deployed, providing crystal-clear, high-performance sound that elevates live presentations. The system delivers precise audio, supporting both the energy and sophistication of the stage while maintaining the overall elegance of the pavilion experience.

robb-report-aham.title: Robb Report x AHAM Capital Private Salon
robb-report-aham.location: Anantara Desaru Coast Resort & Villas, Johor | Malaysia
robb-report-aham.overview: This project showcased how thoughtful speaker selection and precise placement can deliver an immersive sound experience while maintaining architectural harmony. By combining K-array’s discreet performance with Brionvega’s iconic design, we created a soundscape that complemented the luxury setting and elevated the overall event experience.
profile: Robb Report Malaysia is the industry’s leading luxury lifestyle publication. An indispensable and intelligent resource, Robb Report connect with HNWIs with experiences and accoutrements to cultivate and elevate their appreciation of the finest things in life.

AHAM Asset Management Berhad (“AHAM Capital”) is an independently-managed, institutionally-owned asset management ﬁrm. Since its formation in 2001, AHAM Capital has served the wealth needs of corporates, institutions, pension funds, government-linked companies, high net worth individuals and the mass affluent.
additionalNotes: We were honoured to be part of House of Robb, introduced by Robb Report Malaysia in conjunction with AHAM Capital’s Generational Wealth Summit, held at a four-bedroom duplex villa at Anantara Desaru Coast Residences. For this exclusive event, we designed and delivered the complete sound experience, ensuring the audio system enhanced the atmosphere without compromising the refined aesthetics of the space.
eventNarrative: Inside the residence, we integrated K-array Vyper ultra-slim speakers, featuring a discreet 1-inch profile, throughout the event areas. Their minimal form allowed the speakers to blend seamlessly into the architecture, preserving the visual elegance while delivering clear and balanced sound for conversations, background music, and live moments within the space.

For the outdoor and poolside areas, K-array Pinnacle KR402 speakers were deployed to provide consistent coverage across the swimming pool and surrounding outdoor spaces. To elevate the visual and experiential impact, the iconic Brionvega Radiofonografo was positioned beside the television as a design highlight—serving both as a functional audio piece and a statement of Italian design heritage.

brionvega-iconic-collection.title: Brionvega Iconic Audio Collection
brionvega-iconic-collection.overview: Brionvega is an Italian manufacturer of iconic audio objects established in 1960, collaborating with celebrated architects and designers to produce timeless pieces.
profile: Founded in 1960, Brionvega revolutionised the audio industry by treating sound systems as architectural objects, collaborating with legendary designers to create pieces that transcend functionality.

The brand's philosophy centers on the belief that technology should serve beauty, resulting in audio products that have earned places in prestigious museums worldwide, including MoMA and the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
Each Brionvega piece represents a perfect marriage of Italian craftsmanship and innovative engineering, maintaining relevance across generations while preserving their original design integrity.
eventNarrative: The Radiofonografo by Achille and Pier Giacomo Castiglioni remains globally recognised for its uniqueness, exclusivity, and craftsmanship. Revitalised with modern technology, it continues to deliver a stimulating listening experience.
Radiocubo by Marco Zanuso and Richard Sapper captures the vibrant spirit of the 1960s, designed to be proudly displayed as a centrepiece that blends nostalgia with contemporary living.
Totem by Mario Bellini, first introduced in 1971, transforms from a minimal cube into a modular hi-fi system, proving that industrial design can be both sculptural and sonically exceptional.
